name: task-management-webapp
description: Task Management Web Application - Kiro Tutorial Sample

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset

author: Kiro Tutorial Team
